It is these comparisons said of 'As of Yesterday' (his first release) that landed Alguire his first record dealÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“proving that Alguire was only at the start of such musical depth, finding himself label mates alongside his idols Steve Earle, John Hiatt, Kris Kristofferson, and Buddy Miller.
